summary: CRITICAL: React Error 185 (Maximum update depth exceeded) successfully captured and analyzed. Error occurs IMMEDIATELY on page load in RosterSummaryInner component at line 137:73, making the entire dashboard unusable. Previous fixes documented in REACT_185_INFINITE_LOOP_FINAL_FIX.md are NOT working.

critical_bugs.issue: React Error 185: Maximum update depth exceeded - infinite loop on component mount
critical_bugs.impact: COMPLETE DASHBOARD FAILURE - App crashes immediately on load
critical_bugs.error_message: Maximum update depth exceeded. This can happen when a component repeatedly calls setState inside componentWillUpdate or componentDidUpdate. React limits the number of nested updates to prevent infinite loops.

integration_issues.issue: Error boundary catches infinite loop but prevents any dashboard functionality
integration_issues.user_impact: Users see 'Something went wrong' error screen instead of dashboard

additional_findings.finding: React warning also shows: 'Maximum update depth exceeded. This can happen when a component calls setState inside useEffect, but useEffect either doesn't have a dependency array, or one of the dependencies changes on every render'
additional_findings.implication: Issue is specifically in useEffect with missing or incorrect dependencies

additional_findings.finding: Card view disabled via NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_ROSTER_CARDS=true but error still occurs
additional_findings.implication: The infinite loop is not just in card view - it's in the core RosterSummary component

additional_findings.finding: Error occurs whether card view is enabled or disabled
additional_findings.implication: Previous 'fixes' that disabled card view did not solve the root cause

passed_tests: Successfully captured exact React Error 185 stack trace
Confirmed error occurs on initial page load
Verified error boundary is working (shows 'Something went wrong')
Identified exact component and line number causing the issue
Confirmed Zustand store is involved in the infinite loop
action_item_for_main_agent: URGENT: Fix the infinite loop in RosterSummaryInner component at line 137:73 in /src/components/roster/RosterSummary.tsx. The issue is in a useEffect hook that either has missing dependencies or dependencies that change on every render, causing Zustand store to trigger infinite re-renders. The previous fixes documented in REACT_185_INFINITE_LOOP_FINAL_FIX.md are NOT working. The entire dashboard is unusable.

success_percentage.frontend: 0% - Complete failure due to infinite loop crash
